item.description: Made popular in the 80's and featured on Oprah, A Course In Miracles is finally here! Join Cindi Lane as she introduces to you the psychology of Spiritual awareness. A Course in Miracles is a steppingstone for people searching for their spiritual calling and a path that will  lead them to Enlightenment. Learn about Love and fear, and that they are our only two true emotions ~ all unpleasant emotions are born out of fear while joy, peace and forgiveness all extend from Love. Discover how these emotions affect your life daily and learn what you can do to take control of your journey and find spiritual clarity.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Free Intro to : A Course In Miracles
